name: Algreen Ltd.
description:
Algreen is a renewable chemical company focusing on
the development of sustainable and biodegradable solutions for a green future.
Algreen is developing alternative products to replace plastics and harmful to the environment, unsustainable fossil-based products used in the majority of industries such as cosmetics, packaging, fashion, automotive, medical and many more.
slogan: Algreen provides biodegradable materials developed from sustainable algae to replace different kinds of plastic products
